DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to determine the effect of mifepristone on the expression of three cervical EP3 receptor isoforms (EP3-2, EP3-3 and EP3-6) in pregnant women ≤63 days gestational age.
DOC.brief_title: The Effect of Mifepristone on the Expression of Cervical Prostaglandin EP3 Receptors
DOC.criteria: good general health ≥18 years old seeking termination of a viable intrauterine pregnancy of ≤63 days, without any evidence of a threatened or spontaneous abortion medical problems confirmed or suspected ectopic pregnancy having taken medications in the seven days prior to enrollment that would affect PG synthesis or metabolism of mifepristone
